answer:
ImmunizeBC does not provide that information. ImmunizeBC travellers information is here.  When travelling internationally, you may be at risk for a number of diseases that are rarely found in Canada but are common in other parts of the world. Travel vaccines will provide you and your child with important protection. 
Some countries  do require that you have proof of receiving certain vaccines prior to entering the country. These requirements vary by country. Find out which vaccines may be recommended or required for your destination here.
Immunization Nurse
question: Can an unvaccinated child travel to the US
